tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_roles (
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    role_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (role_id) REFERENCES roles(role_id),
    PRIMARY KEY (user_id, role_id)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
 user_id INT,
 username VARCHAR,
 email VARCHAR,
 password VARCHAR,
 access_level INT
);
